subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: After a $20 million roof-to-floor renovation of Thompson-Boling Arena, it is the replacement of the trademark plastic orange seats with sharper-looking black ones that has people talking.
snippet: After a $20 million roof-to-floor renovation of Thompson-Boling Arena, it is the replacement of the trademark plastic orange seats with sharper-looking black ones that has people talking.
